title: Life in Lost Creek: fresh water ecology
creator_credit: Coronet Films, Biomedia Associates and Bruce Russell
brief_description: Investigates fast-moving, slow-moving, and standing freshwater ecosystems. Examines, through underwater photography and photomicrography, living organisms, their adaptations and their interactions within each habitat.
